SELECT b.code AS "code", b.name AS "name", bi.img_path AS "imgPath", bi.img_name AS "imgName"
, (CASE WHEN ll.brand_code is not null then 'Y' else 'N' end ) as "brandLikeYN"
, 'N' as "brandLikeYN"
FROM brand b INNER JOIN brand_image bi ON b.code=bi.brand_code
LEFT OUTER JOIN like_list ll ON b.code = ll.brand_code AND ll.id = #{memberId}

SELECT pInfo.productCode AS "productCode" , pInfo.productName AS "productName" , b.code as "brandCode" , pInfo.imgPath as "imgPath" , b.name as "brandName" , b.like_count as "brandLikeCount" , pInfo.price AS "price" , pInfo.productLikeCount AS "productLikeCount" , pInfo.color as "color" , bi.img_name as "brandLogoName"
, (CASE WHEN ll2.brand_code is not null then 'Y' else 'N' end ) as "brandLikeYN" , pInfo.productLikeYN as "productLikeYN"
FROM brand b INNER JOIN brand_image bi ON b.code = bi.brand_code LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT k.* FROM (SELECT p.code AS productCode , p.name AS productName , P.brand_code AS brandCode , ( P.brand_code || '/' || pi.img_origin_name ) AS imgPath , (SELECT tt.name FROM brand tt WHERE tt.code = p.brand_code) AS brandName , (SELECT bb.like_count FROM brand bb WHERE bb.code = p.brand_code) AS brandLikeCount , TO_CHAR(p.price, 'FM999,999,999,999') AS price , p.like_count AS productLikeCount , p.color AS color , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY p.code ORDER BY PI.seq DESC) AS RN
, (CASE WHEN ll.product_code is not null then 'Y' else 'N' end ) as productLikeYN
FROM product p INNER JOIN (SELECT a.product_code , a.img_origin_name , MIN(a.seq) AS SEQ FROM product_image a WHERE a.thumbanil_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY a.product_code, a.img_origin_name) pi ON p.code = pi.product_code
LEFT OUTER JOIN like_list ll ON p.code = ll.product_code AND ll.id = #{memberId} AND ll.type = 'P'
WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY p.like_count DESC) k WHERE 1 = 1 AND k.rn = 1) pInfo ON b.code = pInfo.brandCode
LEFT OUTER join like_list ll2 ON b.code = ll2.brand_code AND ll2.id = #{memberId} AND ll2.type = 'B'
WHERE b. code = #{brandCode}

SELECT count(*) FROM brand b INNER JOIN brand_image bi ON b.code = bi.brand_code LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT k.* FROM (SELECT p.code AS productCode , p.name AS productName , P.brand_code AS brandCode , ( P.brand_code || '/' || pi.img_origin_name ) AS imgPath , (SELECT tt.name FROM brand tt WHERE tt.code = p.brand_code) AS brandName , (SELECT bb.like_count FROM brand bb WHERE bb.code = p.brand_code) AS brandLikeCount , TO_CHAR(p.price, 'FM999,999,999,999') AS price , p.like_count AS productLikeCount , p.color AS color , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY p.code ORDER BY PI.seq DESC) AS RN FROM product p INNER JOIN (SELECT a.product_code , a.img_origin_name , MIN(a.seq) AS SEQ FROM product_image a WHERE a.thumbanil_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY a.product_code, a.img_origin_name) pi ON p.code = pi.product_code WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY p.like_count DESC) k WHERE 1 = 1 AND k.rn = 1) pInfo ON b.code = pInfo.brandCode WHERE b. code = #{brandCode}
